## RowGroup.Builder.addCells() method

Add new cells/downward growing cells, and sync slots with the new cells only.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

            cells?: Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
            downwardGrowingCells?: Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
        }): Builder;
```
